Articles.Content:
Hi all.

Recently i got hooked to KSPI, Kethane and TAC LS.

I decided i needed more specific and ship-saving parts.

Currently the mod contains 3 resources: FossilizedFuel, LqdOxygen and CoolingLiquid.

A MM file then adds the ability to mine LqdOxygen andFossilized fuel to the stock Kethane drills and the ability to scan it as wel.

LqdOxygen is used in the Cooler Part to be converted into CoolingLiquid, which keeps the ship cooled(KSPI support).

FossilizedFuel is used to generate ElectricalCharge, for use with TAC LS(Uses TAC LS converter, because those are simpler to use).

It's dependencies will be TAC Life Support, KSP Interstellar and Kethane.

Screenshots:

New textures are 1024x1024 so use ATM when hitting the RAM cap. 


[B]First public release.

V0.1
[I]Uploaded

Version 0.1 contains a ModuleManager patch that allows the kethane drills and the kethane scanners to mine and detect the new mineable resources.
Also contains 2 converters/generators.

[/I][/B]V0.2
 Implements a greenhouse and gave the the coolers and converters models and textures.

Plans for this mod:

More converters.

Custom Models and textures.

Smart Drills.

Edited July 6, 2014 by Disiuze

First public release.

V0.1

Uploaded

Version 0.1 contains a ModuleManager patch that allows the kethane drills and the kethane scanners to mine and detect the new mineable resources.

Also contains 2 converters/generators.

Thanks!

I;m also working on a TAC greenhouse that is a bit different than you'd expect in KSP.

New version will be coming out today!

Here's a list of things that've changed.

* Coolers and Generators now have better models and textures thanks to Scarsz.

+ TAC+KSPI Greenhouse

Now before you say that a greenhouse has been done many times, this one uses ElectricCharge, ThermalPower, Waste and Water to create food.

Too expensive you say? Guess you dan't want any food...

V0.2 implements a greenhouse and gave the the coolers and converters models and textures.

The textures are 1024x1024 so when hitting the RAM cap use ATM.
